page.title: 20FASHION,POP / DOMESDAY CLUB
page.content:
{ Fashion}is not very up to date in this area, far from the big cities. Even so, when a new fashion comes in everyone wears it. Boys usually wear jeans, jumper and trainers while girls wear trousers and a baggy patterned blouse or shirt. There are no local pop singers or groups, but{pop music}is up to date because of TV. Some of the favourites here are Wham, Duran Duran, Tears for Fears and Madonna. by Nicola Dunnion & Elaine Dalton
* * * * * * * * * * The Milford Haven Grammar School - {MHGS Domesday Club}comprises twelve enthusiastic 12 and 13 year old boys and girls and 1 member of staff; other contributions have come from residents in the block and local experts.
